title: Innovating Science Education through Service Learning and Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Core Scientific Theories and Research Methodologies, Basic Proficiency in Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric, resource-limited settings, with participation in community-linked science projects.

learning_goals: Students can apply Kolbâ€™s Experiential Learning Theory to perform the four stages of service learning: planning, implementation, reflection, and application.
Students can design and manage community science projects using smartphone-based tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Padlet).

Students can evaluate the connection between theory and practice through reflective journaling and online discussions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
